data.name: GOLF+
data.description:
The ultimate VR Golf experience and the official VR Golf game of the PGA TOUR!

**Available on QUEST 2, 3, and Pro**

‚ÄúThe GOLF+ VR platform is a forward-thinking way to enjoy the sport that is appealing to gamers and golfers of all levels.‚Äù - PGA TOUR

‚ÄúThe visuals are fantastic. It‚Äôs like morphing into another universe filled with vibrancy, dynamism and, most important, realism.‚Äù - Sports Illustrated

‚ÄúThe putting function ‚Äî which simulator golf has never quite cracked ‚Äî is particularly eye-opening.‚Äù - GOLF Magazine


Includes:

‚õ≥Ô∏è Iconic Courses: 3 Free Courses (Cliffs, Alpine, Castle Links) and 15+ real-world destinations available for purchase including Pebble Beach, The Old Course at St Andrews, TPC Sawgrass and more.

üèåÔ∏èMultiplayer: Play with your circle of friends, or join public rounds and connect with golf enthusiasts worldwide.

üìà Performance Feedback: Advanced shot stats, strokes gained data, handicap system, and swing analyzer to help you understand and improve your game.

üèÜ Competitive Play: Climb the ranks and compete globally on the GOLF+ TOUR, or go head to head in Battle mode.

‚úÖ Real Golf Brands: Experience golf equipment from leading brands like Callaway, TaylorMade, and PXG.

üéØ Diverse Modes: From Match Play to Skins, Weekly Challenges and Topgolf, we have an experience for every player.

üèû GOLF+ Clubhouse: A place to practice, fine tune your clubs, and play fun mini-games.

üñ• Media Player: Seamlessly enjoy YouTube and other web media right on the course.

changelog.change_log:
**New Update v751.08**

New Course: Bay Hill Club & Lodge

Host of the PGA TOUR‚Äôs Arnold Palmer Invitational presented by Mastercard, Bay Hill is known for its demanding layout and beautiful scenery.
Set amidst Central Florida‚Äôs lush rolling hills, the serene yet challenging experience is regarded as one of the harder stops on TOUR, with undulating greens, lengthy par 3s and enticing par 5s. For those who dare to take it on, Bay Hill encourages golfers to think creatively and to play boldly.

New Bundle Available: The PGA TOUR Bundle

Unlock 4 PGA TOUR venues at a 25% discount!
Test your game on the island 17th at TPC Sawgrass, soak in the electric atmosphere of TPC Scottsdale's stadium 16th, tackle the demanding layout of Arnold Palmer's Bay Hill Club, and step into golf history at The Riviera Country Club.

Gameplay:

- Added a new toggle Setting for "Always Show Green Contours" when on the Green.
- Added some additional degree rotations (5 & 10) for Snap Rotation in the Settings.
- Added an error message for Topgolf when trying to join a Friend on a different version of the game than you.
- Addressed frame drops, that would occur between "Next Hole" and the following tee box, holing out, and switching your clubs.
- Adjusted crowd sounds and animations that felt delayed and speed of the end of week GOLF+ TOUR recap upon startup.
- Players on the tee box in Unrestricted play will now be visible if you are in the waiting position.
- Reaching the stroke limit on a hole in Battle will only show the "Next Hole" button now.

Quality Updates and Bug Fixes:

- Corrected the spacing on the Battle Leaderboard when handling larger numbers.
- Addressed an issue with Player nametags always displaying and sized incorrectly.
- Fixed various incorrect player club customizations when playing in offline mode.
- Fixed an issue where you would see your putter briefly after selecting "Next Hole".
- Fixed an issue in Challenges where the distance to the pin was incorrect on the user interface.
- Fixed an issue where players could see their ball orient towards the hole when triggering to ball.
- Fixed an issue where the Tutorial would produce a flashing screen if launched while offline.
- Fixed an issue where the ball would be further away when teleporting to it after a tee shot.
- Fixed an issue with the "Top Shots" Leaderboard having inaccurate entries.
- Fixed an issue where the Knockout Leaderboard won't automatically open upon completing a Knockout game.
- Fixed an issue where the Tournament Leaderboard won't automatically open upon completing a Tournament Round.
- Fixed the Club Selection interface being unavailable when users Adjust Clubs in Controls under Settings.
- Fixed the inability to deselect an invited Friend during game creation if they went offline.
- Fixed some Audio sliders in the Settings adjusting incorrect sound types.
- Challenges & Mini-Games: Fixed an issue where tapping for a new ball could cause a shot to occur.
- Swing Analyzer: Fixed an issue where you couldn't view Physics V2 'Advanced Stats' when using trigger.
- Quick Play: Fixed an issue where the "Next Hole" button failed to appear when coming from an active Mini-Game.
- Topgolf: Players will no longer see other players' avatars and clubs in their Bay Monitor.
- Topgolf: Fixed an issue with "Leave Game" in Public/Private Topgolf lobbies not working on first attempt.
- Topgolf: Resolved a visual shimmer issue with the club head of the default Driver.
- Physics V2: Corrected a typo within the Swing Calibration steps.

New Update v749.0

**Updated Course: Pebble Beach Golf Links**

Experience the legendary Pebble Beach, with an updated look, for the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am happening this week.
Pebble Beach has been temporarily updated with tour signage, stands, and crowds to cheer you on during your rounds. 

The VR AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am will start on the GOLF+ TOUR this Thursday, Feb 1st.
Complete all rounds in your tier and automatically be entered into a drawing for a chance to win the course of your choice.
We will have a drawing for each tier, 20 winners! 

**Other Updates**
- Optimized crowd cheering sounds and reactions.

New Update v748.01 is now live!

New Course: The Riviera Country Club
Located in Los Angeles' Pacific Palisades, The Riviera Country Club has been at the pinnacle of golf for nearly a century.
Ranked as one of the top 25 golf courses in the United States. the 18 holes continuously challenge the world's best.
Legendary player Hale Irwin attests that "no two holes are alike and the course has been placed, rather than forced, into the land."
Currently home to The Genesis Invitational, Riviera will also host golf's elite in 2028 as the official site of the Olympics golf tournament.

Quality & Bug Fixes
- The wind speed/direction of a Tournament Practice Round now matches the official Tournament Round.
- Alpine - Hole 17 - Terrain fix near the right side fairway bunker.

New Update v746.01 is now live!

GOLF+ TOUR:
This week's GOLF+ TOUR event is at the Kapalua Plantation Course,
where the pros will also be teeing it up 01.04 for the 2024 PGA TOUR season opener. We've
added PGA TOUR treatment to the tournament lobby and updated Kapalua's green flags!

Quality & Bug Fixes:
- Attachment preset would reset if the custom set up wasn't saved.
- Leaderboards could sometimes show up fuzzy after completing a game.
- Pebble Beach - Hole 9 & 10 - Terrain fixes where ball could go under the rough.
- TPC Sawgrass - Hole 2 - Fixed tree collider on left that was interfering with tee shots.
- Menus could sometimes fire a web crash in specific game transitions.
- Fixed an issue with some settings not saving after uninstalling and reinstalling the app.

## Bug Fixes
‚¶Å Fixed issue with Quest 3 Graphics Quality slider not functioning for users
‚¶Å Fixed issue sometimes causing the fast forward button not to function
‚¶Å Fixed issue in Topgolf mode TopPractice where scores were not being kept for Singleplayer & Multiplayer
‚¶Å Fixed issue resulting in users being switched to Physics V2 after updating the app
‚¶Å Fixed issue where triggering to your ball close to it stopping would position the player away from the ball
‚¶Å Various performance improvements for Q2 & Q3

New Update v745.08

**New Course! Kapalua - The Plantation Course**
Located on the island of Maui, The Plantation Course at Kapalua has been recognized as the best golf course in Hawaii for fifteen consecutive years by Golfweek. 
Designed by the renowned Ben Crenshaw and Bill Coore, the course offers dramatic ocean views from virtually every hole. 
For over a quarter century, Kapalua has played host to The Sentry, the PGA TOUR‚Äôs season-opening event.

**Topgolf Las Vegas**
Private and Public multiplayer options now available!

**GOLF+ TOUR**
Ability to play practice rounds in tournament conditions. Select 'practice' in the tournament lobby.

**Club Attachments**
Updated collection of attachments increasing preset availability along with device compatibility labeling.
Additionally, the ability to save a custom preset with custom offsets to prevent loss of a preferred setting.

**Newly Designed Leaderboards**
Top Shots - Leaderboard ranked by strokes gained along with player replays.
Speed Run - Leaderboard ranked by fastest time to complete a round with lowest score as a tie breaker.

**Quality & Bug Fixes**
- Physics V2 Swing Settings are now being saved to your Profile. Will not lose setup if you have to uninstall and reinstall app for any reason.
- 'Sand Feel' slider was being reset on players.
- Disabled receiving invites while a player is in a Tournament Round.
- Tournament Par Values were not showing correctly if you transitioned from Quickplay mode.
- Fixed drop locations on Holes 7 & 8 of Wolf Creek
- Fixed a crash that could occur after leaving a Multiplayer game
- Fixed issue where players would see "Reactivate G+ Pass" while already subscribed
- Fixed issue where players could not adjust swing settings while in practice or non-handicap rounds.
- The keyboard under "Find Friends" was missing the special characters button.
- Fixed issue where players would sometimes encounter a black screen during a practice swing.

**New Update v744.13**

**Topgolf Las Vegas**
Topgolf Las Vegas is a one-to-one recreation of the real world location.
Take in the Vegas skyline while listening to your favorite jams and chasing leaderboards!

**Replay Tool**
Located in your Profile, you can view your best shots and those of your friends from the past 100 days.
Shots are ranked by 'strokes gained', but we also provide some additional filters!

**Quality & Bug Fixes**
- Performance updates for Quest 2 and Quest 3.
- Fixed hard frame drop on Quest 3 that would shift player's environment.
- Players weren't getting a Next Hole button on Quickplay when coming from a mini-game.
- In certain instances, an accidental tap would cause a black screen.
- The 'Resume Round' option would sometimes not trigger on certain Courses.
- Game UI would flicker upon holing out.
- Adjusted Leaderboard spacing for settings.
- Adjusted course selection search parameters.
- Added a Featured section on course selection for new releases & upcoming.

**Quest 3**
- Graphics Quality slider added to Game Settings - Provides players the ability to increase visual clarity of the environment.
Please note, increasing this may have an impact on gameplay performance on a course by course basis.

OTHER:
- Rift S issue resulting in a low framerate after a few minutes of play is still being worked on for a permanent fix.
  The issue can be temporarily fixed by restarting the game or sleeping your headset then resuming the game.

New Update v743
- The GOLF+ PASS is here! Enjoy all access to our entire course library and future courses with our subscription option.
- The Old Course at St Andrews Links!

Physics V2 Improvements
- Fixed push / pull slider issue where
- Updated spin bias slider percentages to have more impact 
- Small adjustments to power assistance and chipping feel
- Added a "practice shot" to the swing settings. You can hit a practice shot and then adjust the swing settings in real time.
  As you adjust, you'll see a separate blue trail that represents the new ball flight with the adjustments you made.
  You will also see the stats comparison between your stock shot and adjusted shot.
- Ability to show advanced stats by default.
- Hover tips on the advanced stats so players can gain an understanding on what they mean.

Quality & Bug Fixes
- Correct lie should now be displayed after taking an accidental hit
- Metric units should be shown correctly for the ball speed in the shot info, as well as on the ball distance marker
- Able to interact with the course view while playing Battle
- Correct par values on the scorecard are shown when switching from battle to another mode
- The score listed on the bottom of the game view will no longer take playoff scores into account
- Players were seeing invisible avatars in Replay and MP
- System Mute Detection alert for Players if their mic is muted in oculus quick settings
- Drop Collision Fixes
- Course Selection UI redesign

**Patch Release v741.03**

**Bug Fixes**
- Fixed the tool tip for Very Fast Green speeds on the Tournament start page.
- Fixed an issue that caused your Tour points to be displayed with three decimal points instead of two on the Tour leaderboard.
- Fixed an issue on Quest 3 that would cause blurriness while putting. 
- Fixed an issue that made it unable to select anything when switching to the left controller.
- Fixed an issue that caused the Battle leaderboard to show in the Tournament lobby.
- Fixed an issue that caused the Tournament Leaderboard not to automatically open.

**Patch Release v.741.02**

**Updates**
- Added Golf+ TOUR world rank leaderboard.
- Improvements for Q2/Q3/Rift overall performance.

**Physics V2 Updates**
- Tightened up 30 - 50yd range for LW.
- Tightened up 70 - 90yd range for SW.
- Added the ability to turn the club‚Äôs power assistance negative for a preferred softer feel.
- Added ‚ÄòBunker Feel‚Äô to Global Settings.
- V2 stats will now convert to metric.

**Bug Fixes**
- Fixed a crash that occurred from using the LW off rocks.
- Fixed an issue where Club Selection was reverting for the player in certain cases.
- Fixed Topgolf multiplayer bugs.
- Fixed YouTube search.

New Update v741

- The official GOLF+ TOUR kicks off! Earn your world ranking by competing in weekly tournaments.
- Course Graphics and Colors Update: End-to-end visual quality and style updates bringing higher contrast and more life-like environments.
- Physics V2 - Under 'game' in settings as an opt-in experimental feature. Physics engine built based on over 200,000 shots hit on simulators - bringing shot control,  ball flight, spin and roll outs to real world expectations based on your swing. Novice and Amateur have been update to provide a more linear progression Pro, which keeps assistance, but removes the Shot Shaper. Only Novice will have a guideline.
- TIO Free Drop - If you get stuck behind a structure and do not have a shot to the pin, we will alert you and offer a free of penalty drop.
- New 'Very Fast' Green Speed that will sit between 'Fast' and 'Pro', along with the removal of 'Slow' green speed.
- Ability to customize your golf bag and club settings while in practice and non-handicap rounds.
- New game settings for club selection: 'None' - Pick your club. 'Smart' - Club auto selected with lie and elevation taken into account.
- Removal of Pro Putt
- Sunset of Quest 1 standalone updates. 


Quality and Bug Fixes

- Improved the overall Resume Round functionality
- Fixed inconsistent drop locations at Wolf Creek
- Fixed bug that caused the Driver to be adjusted when adjusting the Putter
- Fixed bug that made it unable to hear other players club sound effects
- Fixed a UI issue that players would occasionally encounter when resuming a round
- Fixed a bug that caused the round settings to revert to default when modifying a round
- Fixed an issue that could cause degraded performance when teleporting

Patch Update (v740.01)
- Fixed a bug where sometimes the GOLF+ TOUR Qualifier leaderboards would crash upon load after completing your round.

New Update (v740.0)

- GOLF+ TOUR Qualifying kickoff
- Fixed an issue where sometimes in multiplayer if a player lost internet connection and then rejoined, their score would not get posted correctly.
- Misc Environmental fixes for East Lake

**What is the GOLF+ TOUR?**
The GOLF+ TOUR is our new long-term Tournament Season format where players will compete in weekly tournaments in tiers based on your skill level and performance. You will be assigned a GOLF+ World Ranking which will adjust after every weekly event.

**How does it work?**
- Players can compete on Amateur or Pro difficulty.
- Over the next 4 weeks, you‚Äôll compete in qualifying tournaments in one of three tiers based on your handicap to establish your GOLF+ World Ranking on the GOLF+ TOUR.
- When qualifying ends, the number of tiers will expand to 10 and you‚Äôll be placed in an appropriate skill tier to begin your journey on the GOLF+ TOUR.
- On TOUR you‚Äôll earn points for your Tournament placement and may be promoted or relegated to new tiers based on performance.
- After every week, your GOLF+ World Ranking will update, regardless if you compete or not.
- We plan to have elevated events throughout the GOLF+ TOUR season.

Good luck to everyone, and we‚Äôll see you in the qualifiers!

Patch Release v739.1

- Fixed bug where the Season Ended UI would briefly flash when selecting Tournament Lobby
- Fixed Tournament Leaderboard toggle bugs
- Fixed 'Qualify/Not Qualify' screen issue for when there is no active tournament season resulting in players seeing a message they did not qualify even though they did.
- Removed Qualifying Points from Playoff round end screens & lobbies
- Environmental issues addressed on East Lake and Olympia Fields
- Fixed an issue where Players encounter a blank screen when creating an MP game

New Update v739.0

1. New Course - East Lake Golf Club
2. ESPN+ Feature Hole Streaming - Go to media player and select ESPN+ to watch live coverage of the FedExCup Playoffs for the duration of the tournament.
3. Updated out-of-bounds drop logic

Patch Release v738.5

- Backend updates and bug fixes allowing us to kickoff Week 2 Qualifiers of the VR FedExCup Playoffs. Goodluck!


RESHARING FOR VISIBILITY:

**How do the VR FedExCup Playoffs work?**

Players will compete in 3 weekly tournament events, racking up qualifying points along the way. The top 500 players with the most points will advance to the VR FedExCup Playoffs.

Three Playoff events will take place on the same dates and courses as the PGA TOUR FedExCup Playoffs. There will be an additional cut after each Playoff event, with one golfer being crowned the VR FedExCup Champion at the conclusion of the VR TOUR Championship at East Lake Golf Club.

You‚Äôll choose to participate on either Amateur or Pro difficulty. This choice cannot be changed for the duration of the event.

The VR FedExCup begins with 3 weeks of qualifying. Each week consists of 4 tournament rounds. Qualifying points awarded after the tournament week ends.

Week 1 - TPC Scottsdale - July 20-26
Week 2 - Pebble Beach - July 27-August 2
Week 3 - TPC Sawgrass - August 3-9

**The top 500 point earners will advance to the FedExCup Playoffs!**

Each FedExCup Playoff tournament will mirror the real-life event happening that week - Tee location, pin location, wind speed and direction. 

Week 1 - Top 500 players - VR St. Jude Championship - TPC Southwind - August 10-16
Week 2 - Top 250 players - VR BMW Championship - Olympia Fields Country Club - August 17-23
Week 3 - Top 100 players - VR TOUR Championship - East Lake Golf Club - August 24-27


**Compete for a number of exciting prizes!**
‚ÄòPro‚Äô FedExCup Champion: VIP experience at a 2024 PGA TOUR event!
‚ÄòAmateur‚Äô FedExCup Champion: PGA TOUR prize!
As well as 36 exclusive virtual medals awarded throughout the competition for various accomplishments!

**NEW Update - v738.4**

**ATTENTION GOLFERS - PLEASE READ**
The wedge physics have been updated to how they performed prior to the last update.

Before before embarking on your journey to the VR FedExCup Playoffs we recommend:
- Practicing short range and greenside shots at the Clubhouse.
- Playing a few rounds to feel confident in your scoring.

Thank you for all the feedback around physics. Please continue to report shots that feel off as improving physics is an ongoing process.

**Main Updates Include**
- Tournaments are here with the first ever VR FedExCup Playoffs!
- New course: Olympia Fields Country Club
- New feature: Distance to pin shown while dropping a ball after going out of bounds.
- Faster scene transition time.

**How do the VR FedExCup Playoffs work?**

Players will compete in 3 weekly tournament events, racking up qualifying points along the way. The top 500 players with the most points will advance to the VR FedExCup Playoffs.

Three Playoff events will take place on the same dates and courses as the PGA TOUR FedExCup Playoffs. There will be an additional cut after each Playoff event, with one golfer being crowned the VR FedExCup Champion at the conclusion of the VR TOUR Championship at East Lake Golf Club.

You‚Äôll choose to participate on either Amateur or Pro difficulty. This choice cannot be changed for the duration of the event.

The VR FedExCup begins with 3 weeks of qualifying. Each week consists of 4 tournament rounds. Qualifying points awarded after the tournament week ends.

Week 1 - TPC Scottsdale - July 20-26
Week 2 - Pebble Beach - July 27-August 2
Week 3 - TPC Sawgrass - August 3-9

**The top 500 point earners will advance to the FedExCup Playoffs!**

Each FedExCup Playoff tournament will mirror the real-life event happening that week - Tee location, pin location, wind speed and direction. 

Week 1 - Top 500 players - VR St. Jude Championship - TPC Southwind - August 10-16
Week 2 - Top 250 players - VR BMW Championship - Olympia Fields Country Club - August 17-23
Week 3 - Top 100 players - VR TOUR Championship - East Lake Golf Club - August 24-27


**Compete for a number of exciting prizes!**
‚ÄòPro‚Äô FedExCup Champion: VIP experience at a 2024 PGA TOUR event!
‚ÄòAmateur‚Äô FedExCup Champion: PGA TOUR prize!
As well as 36 exclusive virtual medals awarded throughout the competition for various accomplishments!

**NEW Course: TPC Southwind - Home of the 2023 Fedex St. Jude Classic.**

**Multiplayer Feature Update**

- **Rejoin an active multiplayer game.**
    - Drop out mid round i.e. internet drops, headset battery dies, leave game voluntarily, take too long to get back from doing something and you get timed out.
    - Simply re-enter the room name and join right where you left off.
        - If players have moved on, you will be able to catch up and get right back into rotation. (Standard and Unrestricted turn modes)


**Other MP Quality Updates**

Player disconnecting
     - Ability to boot a player timing out and move on.
When player is disconnecting/timing out:
    - A new notification system alerting players of the disconnect
    - Avatar icon on main course screen has a timer

Multiplayer messaging:
Match Play & Skins
    - UI message and sound with what is at stake
        - When a putt is to tie or to win.
        - If skins, we show the amount of skins on the line.

- Player ‚Äòconceded hole‚Äô notification and sound.
- +4 stroke limit in Public Games
- Scorecard now shows ‚Äòactive‚Äô stroke for players.


**Other Updates**

**Improvements and protections to aid against unintentional mishits**

**New setting under ‚ÄòGame‚Äô: New rotation degree option.**
Now you have the option to choose an option with less rotation.

**Lie Type on main course UI.**
You can now find your lie labeled under your shot count.

**New Setting under ‚ÄòUI‚Äô: High Resolution Screens**
Ability to make your screens HD.

**Media Player bug fix**
Youtube search results to appear correctly.

**Unrestricted Multiplayer**
Righty and Lefty players will now be hidden to each other if on the tee shot at the same time.

**TPC Sawgrass**
Crowds now only in stands.
